name: A Brief Tale
description:
A Brief Tale is a short RPG made with RPG Maker MV. The game is inspired by the never-ending story. It was created as part of the Jim Jam 2018 in a timespan of 48 hours.

Controls: 

  • Arrow keys to move 
  • Enter key to interact 
  • Esc to access the menu 
  • Alternatively you can use the left mouse button to move & interact (might be a little harder to interact with objects).

Credits:

  • Avery (art)
  • PandaMaru (art)
  • wthdragon (art)
  • Yanfly (scripts; http://yanfly.moe/)
  • Galv (scripts; https://galvs-scripts.com/)
  • SumRndmDde (scripts; http://sumrndm.site)
  • Terrax (scripts)
  • YouFulca (music; https://wingless-seraph.net)
